pl.polsl.lab.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.lab.controller.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuController, SortController

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class for controller, which is responsible for interpreting user's input, giving commands to model and communitacing between model and view.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Mateusz Ch≈Çopek

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Commands command
      An object of enum class that represent the command which value is chosen during user's input interpretation.
      protected Communicator communicator
      An object that represent a communication between server and client.
      protected int mode
      A current program mode.
      protected Model model
      An object that represents program's model.
      protected Buttons pressedButton
      An object of enum class that represents the type of pressed button.
      protected boolean runProgram
      A variable that informs program when it has to be closed (false).

      Constructor and Description
      Controller() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void communicate(Communicator communicator)
      A method that allows server-client communication.
      Commands getCommand()
      A getter that gives access to private field - command - inforamtion about controller's command that model will recive.
      int getMode()
      A getter for a mode private field.
      boolean getRun()
      A getter that gives access to private field - runProgram - main program condition to keep running.
      protected abstract void processInput()
      A controller's method where user's input is interpreted.
      void run()
      A primary controller's method.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        A primary controller's method. Required for program to work.

      • communicate

        protected abstract void communicate(Communicator communicator)
        A method that allows server-client communication.
        Parameters:
        communicator - An object that represent a communication between server and client.

      • processInput

        protected abstract void processInput()
        A controller's method where user's input is interpreted.

      • getCommand

        public Commands getCommand()
        A getter that gives access to private field - command - inforamtion about controller's command that model will recive.
        Returns:
        an enum that gives information about controller's command.

      • getRun

        public boolean getRun()
        A getter that gives access to private field - runProgram - main program condition to keep running.
        Returns:
        true when it's required to exit from program, false when it continues it's work.

      • getMode

        public int getMode()
        A getter for a mode private field.
        Returns:
        A current program mode: 1 - menu; 2 - sorting.
